Articles.Content:
(Finally got around to re-posting this after it was deleted in the forum reboot)

okay, so I decided to try my hand at building a Russian Soyus space craft and launcher in KSP.

To my eyes it looks ok, but I wanted to know what everyone else thinks

Is it okay, or does it still need work?

pics

Version 1: http://imgur.com/a/UaL7F

Version 2: http://imgur.com/a/fzmxZ

Launcher: http://imgur.com/a/fJPWS

It's very nice and looks more authentic than my ÃÂ¡ÃÂ¾Ã‘Å½ÃŒÂÃÂ· (1m parts, command pod, decoupler, parachutes on side and docking port on top, below decouper an ASAS and around it rcs tanks, smallest 1m fuel tank and smallest 1m rocket. RCS thrusters on the body of the rocket. Mechjeb optional) but it's in 2m parts, which means it's too big.

Nicely done!

A shame KSP doesn't have more "rounded" / spherical / hemispherical parts in stock.

Download?

stuipid 10 character thing...

I'm planning on putting it up on the exchange for anyone who wants it, when i get a chance

It's very nice and looks more authentic than my ÃÂ¡ÃÂ¾Ã‘Å½ÃŒÂÃÂ· (1m parts, command pod, decoupler, parachutes on side and docking port on top, below decouper an ASAS and around it rcs tanks, smallest 1m fuel tank and smallest 1m rocket. RCS thrusters on the body of the rocket. Mechjeb optional) but it's in 2m parts, which means it's too big.

I know. I did try building it with smaller parts, but it looked terrible :/

Nicely done!

A shame KSP doesn't have more "rounded" / spherical / hemispherical parts in stock.

Yeah, I'd love to see some 'rounded' parts added, and some new deployable antenna parts too.
I sort of heard a rumour that Squad considered adding a "Soyuz-style" 2-seater capsule.
Looks amazing! I like how you added the antennas on for extra authenticity!

I sort of heard a rumour that Squad considered adding a "Soyuz-style" 2-seater capsule.

Kerbal really does need a stock two-seater capsule, and since Nova Punch has already provided a Gemini capsule I guess it should probably be a Soyuz-style capsule for completeness.
Nice design! The solar arrays look a little large for a Soyuz - I think maybe the smaller ones would work better. Apart from that - *thumbs up*

The KSPX mod was supposed to have a soyuz style 2 seater pod. Now that the mod maker (I forgot her name) is working for Squad hopefully that pod will be added to the game in the next update or SOONÃ¢â€žÂ¢.

Nice design! The solar arrays look a little large for a Soyuz - I think maybe the smaller ones would work better. Apart from that - *thumbs up*

Nah, the smaller ones were TOO small sadly

The KSPX mod was supposed to have a soyuz style 2 seater pod. Now that the mod maker (I forgot her name) is working for Squad hopefully that pod will be added to the game in the next update or SOONÃ¢â€žÂ¢.

I so hope it is added soon
